edu.ohio.ent.cs5500

Class UndirectedArc

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.Arc
      • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.UndirectedArc

  • public class UndirectedArc
extends Arc
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    This class contains all the information about the undirected arcs in the graph.
    Author:
    Arif
